mean_cn: n.天气；  v.风化，受风蚀，经受风雨
mean_en: the state of the air and atmosphere at a particular time and place :the temperature and other outside conditions (such as rain, cloudiness, etc.) at a particular time and place
sentence: The weather was different when we went back to that place.
sentence_trans: 我们再回到同一个地方的时候，天气和第一次的不一样了。
